nodes.text: Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures Volume 3
Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures Volume 3 is the third volume in the Clone Wars Adventures series, inspired by Cartoon Network's Clone Wars cartoons that ran from 2003 to 2005.

Inspired by Cartoon Network's Clone Wars cartoons, this comic book series uses the television show as a jumping-off point to tell new stories of heroism and villainy in the same stripped-down visual style.
Pit themselves against the monstrous cyborg, General Grievous!
Battle through the streets of Ord Mantell to recover a most precious cargo!
Brings law to a lawless town—Whether they want it or not!
Incredible action, hot art, and lightning-fast pacing are coming your way in this new take on the Star Wars galaxy!
